JOB DESCRIPTION Develops and maintains functional test cases, System & Integration Test cases and other test artifacts like test data, and automated scripts that are used throughout the QA cycle Responsible for writing and executing manual or automated test cases and audit scripts that validate the functionalities, code quality, and data. Influencing – Knowledge of effective influencing tactics and strategies; ability to impact decisions within and outside own organization. Process Management – Knowledge of business process improvement tools and techniques and ability to understand, monitor, update, or enhance existing business or work processes. Products and Services – Knowledge of major products and services and product and service groups; ability to apply this knowledge appropriately to diverse situations.\ Software Development Life Cycle – Knowledge of and experience with using a structured methodology for delivering new or enhanced software products to the marketplace. Software Quality Assurance And Testing – Knowledge of and ability to apply appropriate processes, tools, and techniques for assuring a high level of quality in computer software products and systems. Technical Documentation Management – Knowledge of, and experience in management of the development, delivery and maintenance of technology product documentation and publications.
